Package com.example.trojanplanner

Class ActivityManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.trojanplanner.ActivityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
public class ActivityManager extends Object implements android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
A class which is instantiated by the App class and manages storing the up-to-date activity that is currently running on the app. This provides a way for non-fragment/non-activity classes to get the currently running activity on the app in case they need to register actions or access UI components (e.g. PhotoPicker)
